teaser: Airing on Thursday, March 12, 2015: The Federal Reserve just released the results of its second round of stress tests, and two European banks have failed. We chat with the BBC's Andrew Walker about what went wrong. Next up: Bankrate.com issues its survey on how Americans intend to use their tax refunds. Are Americans really as frugal and responsible as they claim to be? Finally, we get the latest dispatch the LearningCurve team at the SXSWedu conference in Austin.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, March 12, 2015
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, March 12, 2015
byline: D Gorenstein, Mitchell Hartman, Sam Harnett, Adrienne Hill, David Brancaccio and Adam Allington
